feed.title: OneUptime Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OneUptime: 7.0.3038
entry.content:
<details> <summary>Changes</summary>
- Release - PR: #1670 - Add option to configure ENCRYPTION_SECRET and ONEUPTIME_SECRET using external secrets - PR: #1676 - Improved comments on /App/FeatureSet/ApiReference/Service/Status.ts - PR: #1678 - Improved comments on /App/FeatureSet/Workers/DataMigrations/AddMonitoringDatesToMonitors.ts - PR: #1681 - Improved comments on /App/FeatureSet/Home/Static/js/switchUrl.js - PR: #1679 - Improved comments on /App/FeatureSet/Workers/Jobs/MonitorMetrics/MonitorMetricsByMinute.ts - PR: #1680 - Improved comments on /App/FeatureSet/Workers/DataMigrations/AddAttributesColumnToSpanAndLog.ts - PR: #1677
</details>

entry.title: New release for OneUptime: 7.0.3076
entry.content: No significant changes were made. We have just fixed minor bugs for this release. You can find the detailed information in the commit history.
